pages.text: Warlocks are known to have a very fungal brown robes with a nice sash wrapped around it. With some Red Wool, A couple of Wartful Eggs and Nether Warts, you've figured out how to make your own Warlock sash and which makes it so using that a Wartful Egg no longer harms you.

The Warlock Robe causes the wearer to be resistant to magic damage and provides a 10%% chance of not consuming any Wartful Eggs or a Snap Fungi and gives a 25%% chance for an additional Snap Fungi to drop from full grown Snap Warts. The Sash and Robe also cause Spiders to more likely drop Spider Eggs. If the wearer has a negative status effect, the garment will automatically use up any Wartful Eggs within the wearer's inventory.
Much like wearing a Witches Hat and Robe, wearing Warlock Robes causes all Witches and Warlocks to be neutral and barter-able.
